DataElement.preferredName: AIDS Malignancy Consortium Patient Inclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria 047 Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type of element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trials cooperative group supported by NCI.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: AIDS Malignancy Consortium Patient Inclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial of a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment in a clinical trials cooperative group supported by NCI.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: Established in 1995 to carry out Phase I and II studies of innovative therapies for AIDS malignancies.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: 047 Inclusion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of clinical trial eligibility inclusion criteria for an AIDS Malignancy Consortium 047 protocol.

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject have previously untreated, histologically or cytologically documented B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject have previously untreated, histologically or cytologically documented B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject have previously untreated, histologically or cytologically documented B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject have previously untreated, histologically or cytologically documented B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma

PermissibleValues.value: Does the patient have the ability and willingness to give informed consent?
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the patient have the ability and willingness to give informed consent?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the patient have the ability and willingness to give informed consent?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the patient have the ability and willingness to give informed consent?

PermissibleValues.value: Is the disease one of the following histologies: follicular large-cell (Grade 3), DLBCL, immunoblastic, plasmablastic, or primary effusion lymphoma
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the disease one of the following histologies: follicular large-cell (Grade 3), DLBCL, immunoblastic, plasmablastic, or primary effusion lymphoma

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Is the disease one of the following histologies: follicular large-cell (Grade 3), DLBCL, immunoblastic, plasmablastic, or primary effusion lymphoma
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Is the disease one of the following histologies: follicular large-cell (Grade 3), DLBCL, immunoblastic, plasmablastic, or primary effusion lymphoma

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject have documented HIV infection (Documentation may be serologic [ELISA, western blot], culture, or quantitative PCR or bDNA assays. Prior documentation of HIV seropositivity is acceptable)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject have documented HIV infection (Documentation may be serologic [ELISA, western blot], culture, or quantitative PCR or bDNA assays. Prior documentation of HIV seropositivity is acceptable)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject have documented HIV infection (Documentation may be serologic [ELISA, western blot], culture, or quantitative PCR or bDNA assays. Prior documentation of HIV seropositivity is acceptable)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject have documented HIV infection (Documentation may be serologic [ELISA, western blot], culture, or quantitative PCR or bDNA assays. Prior documentation of HIV seropositivity is acceptable)

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject have either measurable or non-measurable tumor parameter(s) Non-measurable tumor parameters are defined as not having bidimensional measurements but can be followed for response by other diagnostic tests
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject have either measurable or non-measurable tumor parameter(s) Non-measurable tumor parameters are defined as not having bidimensional measurements but can be followed for response by other diagnostic tests

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject have either measurable or non-measurable tumor parameter(s) Non-measurable tumor parameters are defined as not having bidimensional measurements but can be followed for response by other diagnostic tests
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject have either measurable or non-measurable tumor parameter(s) Non-measurable tumor parameters are defined as not having bidimensional measurements but can be followed for response by other diagnostic tests

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject's bilirubin measure <= 2.0 mg/dL (unless elevated secondary to lymphomatous involvement of liver or biliary system, or due to other HIV medications [e.g., indinavir or atazanavir])
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject's bilirubin measure <= 2.0 mg/dL (unless elevated secondary to lymphomatous involvement of liver or biliary system, or due to other HIV medications [e.g., indinavir or atazanavir])

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject's bilirubin measure <= 2.0 mg/dL (unless elevated secondary to lymphomatous involvement of liver or biliary system, or due to other HIV medications [e.g., indinavir or atazanavir])
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject's bilirubin measure <= 2.0 mg/dL (unless elevated secondary to lymphomatous involvement of liver or biliary system, or due to other HIV medications [e.g., indinavir or atazanavir])

PermissibleValues.value: Does the subject's creatinine measure <= 2.0 mg/dL or is creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min (unless secondary to renal involvement by lymphoma)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Does the subject's creatinine measure <= 2.0 mg/dL or is creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min (unless secondary to renal involvement by lymphoma)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Does the subject's creatinine measure <= 2.0 mg/dL or is creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min (unless secondary to renal involvement by lymphoma)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Does the subject's creatinine measure <= 2.0 mg/dL or is creatinine clearance >= 60 mL/min (unless secondary to renal involvement by lymphoma)

PermissibleValues.value: Do the subject's granulocytes (ANC) measure >= 1000 mm^3 and platelets >= 75,000 dL (unless these parameters are abnormal secondary to lymphomatous involvement of bone marrow, or due to HIV-related thrombocytopenia)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Do the subject's granulocytes (ANC) measure >= 1000 mm^3 and platelets >= 75,000 dL (unless these parameters are abnormal secondary to lymphomatous involvement of bone marrow, or due to HIV-related thrombocytopenia)

PermissibleValues.value: Is the subject's left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) at or above the lower institutional limits of normal, as assessed by MUGA scan or echocardiogram, obtained within the 6 weeks prior to registration
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Is the subject's left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) at or above the lower institutional limits of normal, as assessed by MUGA scan or echocardiogram, obtained within the 6 weeks prior to registration
